translations.chinese: 九月，歸太公、呂后，軍皆稱萬歲。
translations.english: In the ninth month, he returned the Duke of Tai and Empress Lü. The army all shouted ten thousand years.
He then enfeoffed Hou Gong as Lord of Pingguo.
Xiang Yu withdrew and returned east.

translations.chinese: 漢王欲西歸，張良、陳平諫曰：「今漢有天 下太半，而諸侯皆附，楚兵罷食盡，此天亡之時，不因其幾而遂取之，所謂養虎自遺患也。」
translations.english: King Han wanted to return west. Zhang Liang and Chen Ping advised: "Now Han possesses more than half the world, and all the feudal lords are attached. Chu troops are exhausted and food is finished. This is the time Heaven has doomed them. If we do not take advantage of this opportunity to destroy them, this is called raising a tiger that brings disaster to oneself."
